miosix::ExceptionHandlingData Class Reference

#include <syscalls_types.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 ExceptionHandlingData ()
 ~ExceptionHandlingData ()

Detailed Description

This is a wrapper class that contains all per-thread data required to make C++ exceptions thread safe, irrespective of the ABI.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

miosix::ExceptionHandlingData::ExceptionHandlingData (  )  [inline]

Constructor, initializes the exception related data to their default value

miosix::ExceptionHandlingData::~ExceptionHandlingData (  )  [inline]

Destructor, checks that no memory is leaked (should never happen)
